name: Mission Control
description: The only project & task manager you need to get sh*t doneA complete Notion project & task management system that eliminates overwhelm and keeps you focused on what matters most, built on proven productivity frameworks.Transform your chaotic task list into a strategic command center.The Mission Control uses the Eisenhower Matrix, GTD methodology, and OKR principles to automatically prioritize your work and eliminate decision fatigue.Perfect for entrepreneurs, freelancers, and professional
features: üéØ Smart Priority System (Eisenhower Matrix):Automatic task categorization by urgency and importance so you never waste time on busy work again and only focus on what moves the needle; üìä Visual Project Progress Tracking:Real-time progress bars and completion percentages so you can see exactly how close you are to finishing projects and stay motivated; ‚è±Ô∏è Time Estimation & Accuracy Tracking:Estimate task duration and track actual time spent so you can get better at planning your days and avoid overcommitting; üîÑ GTD-Based Inbox Processing:Capture everything, then systematically process into actionable items so you can clear mental clutter and never lose track of important tasks again; üìÖ Calendar Integration & Time Blocking:Drag-and-drop tasks directly onto your calendar so you can time block and turn your task list into a realistic daily schedule; üß† Context-Based Task Grouping:Organize tasks by state so you can batch similar work together and eliminate context switching
